MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank, affecting properties in Kimberley Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:11am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of additional engineers heading to site to assist with the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:31am on the 14th of April 2021.
